name: Intracranial Symphony
description:
!!if you want to play this game on the WEB, please click full screen!!

Intracranial Symphony - This game joins ACCD game jam

How we interpret the them 1 + 1 = 3:

People are driven by different ideas. When two ideas work together, people can get new insight.

Game Introduction:

This is a local-coop 2d platformer game. Two players are two minds in little girl's the spirit world. all their movements and actions will be applied on the movement and the actions of that little girl. Players goal is move three of them to the end of the level.

Game Control:

P1: 

WASD to move

F key to grab the handle

G key to kick the other player

P2: 

arrow keys to move

F key to grab the handle

G key to kick the other player
